title: Shanghai Petrochemical
text:
Shanghai Petrochemical (, , ) (), full name Sinopec Shanghai Petrochemical Company Limited (), the <a href="subsidiary">subsidiary</a> company of <a href="Sinopec">Sinopec</a>, is one of the largest <a href="petrochemical%20enterprise">petrochemical enterprise</a>s in <a href="Mainland%20China">Mainland China</a>. It is engaged in <a href="Manufacturing">production</a> of <a href="ethylene">ethylene</a>, <a href="fiber">fiber</a>, <a href="resin">resin</a> and <a href="plastics">plastics</a>. The company is registered in <a href="Shanghai">Shanghai</a>.
Its headquarters are in <a href="Jinshan%20District">Jinshan District</a>, <a href="Shanghai">Shanghai</a>.
There have been hopes that Sinopec, Shanghai Petrochemical's <a href="parent%20company">parent company</a>, will process share reform and <a href="privatize">privatize</a> <a href="Yizeng%20Chemical%20Fibre">Yizeng Chemical Fibre</a> and Sinopec Shanghai Petrochemical, but the plan does not finalize until this moment.
